title: Search Stories (Old)

params.name: archived
params.desc: A true/false boolean indicating whether the Story is in archived state.

params.name: completed_at_end
params.desc: Stories should have been completed before this date.

params.name: completed_at_start
params.desc: Stories should have been competed after this date.

params.name: created_at_end
params.desc: Stories should have been created before this date.

params.name: created_at_start
params.desc: Stories should have been created after this date.

params.name: deadline_end
params.desc: Stories should have a deadline before this date.

params.name: deadline_start
params.desc: Stories should have a deadline after this date.

params.name: epic_id
params.desc: The Epic IDs that may be associated with the Stories.

params.name: epic_ids
params.desc: The Epic IDs that may be associated with the Stories.

params.name: estimate
params.desc: The number of estimate points associate with the Stories.

params.name: external_id
params.desc: An ID or URL that references an external resource. Useful during imports.

params.name: iteration_id
params.desc: The Iteration ID that may be associated with the Stories.

params.name: iteration_ids
params.desc: The Iteration IDs that may be associated with the Stories.

params.name: label_ids
params.desc: The Label IDs that may be associated with the Stories.

params.name: label_name
params.desc: The name of any associated Labels.

params.name: owner_id
params.desc: An array of UUIDs for any Users who may be Owners of the Stories.

params.name: owner_ids
params.desc: An array of UUIDs for any Users who may be Owners of the Stories.

params.name: project_id
params.desc: The IDs for the Projects the Stories may be assigned to.

params.name: project_ids
params.desc: The IDs for the Projects the Stories may be assigned to.

params.name: requested_by_id
params.desc: The UUID of any Users who may have requested the Stories.

params.name: story_type
params.desc: The type of Stories that you want returned.

params.name: updated_at_end
params.desc: Stories should have been updated before this date.

params.name: updated_at_start
params.desc: Stories should have been updated after this date.

params.name: workflow_state_id
params.desc: The unique IDs of the specific Workflow States that the Stories should be in.

params.name: workflow_state_types
params.desc: The type of Workflow State the Stories may be in.

description: Search Stories lets you search Stories based on desired parameters.
